ABOUT
ME

YU CHIAO KUO
Born in 1993, Chai-yi, Taiwan

Freelance illustrator based in UK/Taiwan
MA Illustration in Cambridge school of arts, ARU
BA degree in Taiwan, studied Spanish literature in Tamkang University

I can speak Chinese, English, Spanish and basic Korean.
